level.heading: Execution of written will; attestation.
level.text: A will or testament, other than a will executed in the manner provided by section 18-107, is void unless it is:
in writing and signed by the testator, or by another person in his presence and by his express direction; and
attested and subscribed in the presence of the testator, by at least two credible witnesses.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 1-1001.06a, § 18-105, and § 18-109.
